docs.title: Home
docs.text:
# ALB — User Guide

Welcome! This site covers installation, quick start, common workflows, and troubleshooting for **ALB**.

- **New user?** Start with [Quick Start](quick-start.md)

- **Installing?** See [Download \& Install](download-install.md)

docs.title: Download & Install
docs.text:
# Download \& Install

1. Download the latest release from the GitHub Releases page.

2. Unzip to your EuroScope plugins folder.

3. Start EuroScope and enable the ALB plugin.

Having issues? See [Troubleshooting](troubleshooting.md).

docs.title: FAQ
docs.text:
# FAQ

**Where do I download?** See [Download \& Install](download-install.md).

**How do I claim FMR?** See [Workflows](user/workflows.md).

docs.title: Quick Start
docs.text:
# Quick Start

1. Launch EuroScope with ALB enabled.

2. Open the ALB window from the plugin menu.

3. Verify connection and legend status.

Next: [Using the UI](user/ui.md)

docs.title: Release Notes
docs.text:
# Release Notes

See the GitHub Releases page for detailed change logs.

docs.title: Troubleshooting
docs.text:
# Troubleshooting

- No ALB window? Check plugin load order.

- Messages not sending? Verify FMR state and network status.
